content: to 8 stitches round 2 increases to 9 stitches round 3 increases to 10 stitches round 5 increases to 14 stitches this results in 896 stitches 895 actually because the very last yarn over at the end of round 7 is skipped for the next 12 rounds not a multiple of 8 9 or 10 but i am the boss of the number 12 knit 5 rounds to establish water s edge complete the 7 rounds of waves and droplets round 1 ssk k5 k2tog yo round 2 k7 k1 and p1 into the same yo creates one stitch round 3 ssk k3 k2tog yo k1 2 times yo round 4 knit round 5 ssk k1 k2tog yo k1 5 times yo round 6 k3 p11 round 7 sk2p yo k11 yo skip the last yo at the very end of the round bind off you can use any bind off that you like but it is critical that it be stretchy because a circular shawl needs an extremely stretchy edge to allow it to be stretched enough while blocking the camping shawl already has a nice stretchy edge because the waves and droplets edging increases the number of stitches by about half for the waves and droplets i like a lace bind off in knit but of course you are the boss of your knitting and you might have a favourite and equally stretchy bind off of your own lace bind off in knit k1 *k1 slip left needle through the front of both stitches on the right needle and knit them together repeat from * until all stitches bound off © 2010 mwaa knit obsession http //www ravelry com/designers/mwaa knit ez 100th anniversary pi shawl camping page 5 blocking the waves and droplets edging requires a bit more blocking work than usual there are 64 waves and i used 5 pins per wave 320 pins i did it in two stages which really helped i first drew out one point per wave in the very middle of the wave all around the shawl 64 pins and adjusted until i had a good and even stretch and round circumference it helps to use a yard stick to measure from the centre of the shawl to the edge and make sure this radius is the same all around the shawl once i was happy with the circumference i blocked out each wave with 4 additional pins to get a nice round edge on each one charts for the stitch patterns rounds not shown are knit ez 100th anniversary pi shawl camping © 2010 mwaa knit obsession http //www ravelry
